lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Bankers said this serious shortfall in Qatar"s revenue has led to a new spate of payments delays from the public sector to private contractors after a marginal improvement in January.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The soft spot oil market has left official Qatari crude prices 20 to 40 cents more expensive and sales have been running in recent weeks at 100,000 and 120,000 barrels per day, well down on the nation"s OPEC quota of 285,000, oil sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But the strong assets growth partly reflected bridging loans for the public and private sector to tide government departments and local business over the lean economic spell, Attiya said.

lst.name: sentence

lst.str: The soft spot oil market has left official Qatari crude prices 20 to 40 cents more expensive and sales have been running in recent weeks at 100,000 and 120,000 barrels per day, well down on the nation"s OPEC quota of 285,000, oil sources said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But the strong assets growth partly reflected bridging loans for the public and private sector to tide government departments and local business over the lean economic spell, Attiya said.
